alert.note: Alert for Fairfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fairfield County through 745 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blackstock, or 11 miles south of Chester, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Fairfield County Airport, Monticello, Longtown, Jenkinsville, Blair, Lake Wateree State Park, Ridgeway, Lebanon Fire Station, Henderson Island, Mitford, Fairfield County Detention Center, Rion, Winnsboro Mills, Fairfield Elementary School, Feasterville Fire Station, Smallwood, White Oak and Blackstock. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 30 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
